sentence: Top notch service

Upon our departure he was back up near the front desk saw me carrying my vase of flowers and he immediately told our bell person to get me a box for my flowers they had that for me lickety split to keep the flowers from toppling over
The grounds are beautiful the hotel staff is super attentive and polite and the room itself was comfortable and was the perfect environment to make your mind drift away and relax
Very informative and each employee had great product knowledge
The food was nice Staff was so attentive We never left the property
Great staff and layout
The staff was very considerate of those that were handicapped
The pool bar staff was awesome Crystal gets five stars hands down
From check in to check out every interaction with staff was professional polite and helpful
The service was superb and hotel was beautiful
About 6 months into planning chateau elan has a personnel change
I honestly am shocked they advertise “ unparalleled ” customer service
My My My this is not 1st Class service
The staff that have been there for years should be given more respect and dignity
The whole place felt eerie with not so much of a welcoming staff as you would expect from place like this
Of minor importance I found their phone system sent me in circles and they could use a Concierge to lend advice and tie it all together
Housekeeping service was AWFUL
However on the night of the wedding reception when we were on dance floor we noticed that the staff of the event decided to start breaking down the tables prior to the event being over
My friend was checking in and heard a front desk staff member whisper as she was checking in to put the white family in the newly renovated room as they proceeded to put her family in the older rooms
All staff stopped to politely talk with us and did not ignore us to just do their job even if it was to just deliver something
I just spent twenty minutes on gold waiting to talk to someone and hearing how important customers and employees are
The delivery charge for room service in addition to tip was insulting
Worst customer service ever
The front desk people also seemed very underwhelmed to be there
Maybe if they attendants did n’t talk to one person so long but pour for others also it would made a higher score
